bookinfo.title: JBoss Business Intelligence and Reporting Tools Integration User Guide
bookinfo.subtitle: Provides information about the use of the Business Intelligence and Reporting Tools (BIRT) plug-in as part of the JBoss Developer Studio.

abstract.para: This guide provides a reference for use of the Business Intelligence and Reporting Tools (BIRT) plug-in with the JBoss Developer Studio. The BIRT plug-in is an open source reporting system for web applications.
